post.author: 이창화
post.content:
KOTRA 토론토 KBC는 전문인력 유치 기관 Contact KOREA 업무를 수행하고 있으며, 오는 11월 한국에서 개최 예정인 GT2009 행사를 알려드립니다.

유니데이터 커뮤니케이션 사는 이번 GT 2009를 통해 무선 통신 마케팅 전문가를 모집하고 있으며, 많은 관심 부탁드립니다.

신청을 희망하시는 지원자는 10월 1일까지 chrislee@kotra.ca로 이력서를 보내주시기 바랍니다.

[GLOBAL TALENT KOREA 2009] Engineers, Scientist, Computer Programmer

        Join us for the PERFECT MIX of
CAREER-BUILDING, EXPERTISE and EXPERIENCE
                             At a NEW working environment

You are cordially invited to take part in “Global Talent KOREA 2009” (GT KOREA) organized by Contact KOREA*, a division of KOTRA**. GT KOREA 2009 has been designed to provide promising employment opportunities in Korea for industry experts and professionals. Through this program, participants will receive the following support:  
  • Matching skills and experience with a suitable Korean company
  • Arranging a job interview with the above company
  • 50% of round-trip airfare(reimbursement) and accommodations for 2 nights

*Contact KOREA is a service initiated by KOTRA in cooperation with her 40 overseas Korea Business Centers (KBCs) located in 29 countries to attract and support professional human resources for work in Korea.
**KOTRA: Korea Trade-Investment Promotion Agency

Program
  • Date: November 20-22, 2009
  • Location: Hotel Seoul Kyoyuk Munhwa Hoekwan
  • Attendees: 50 Korean companies, 140 professionals worldwide)

EMPLOYERS:  
  • 유니데이타 커뮤니케이션
   - Developed WiFi phone and supplied to LG Dacom ’myLG070’ almost 1.3 million sets

JOB DESCRIPTION & REQUIREMENTS:

  • 유니데이타 커뮤니케이션
   - 무선통신 마케팅 전문가 모집(Global marketing division business development manager)
   - 관련 전공(이공계열) 학사 이상
   - VoIP, WiFi terminal business development for overseas marketing
   - Potential customer development
   - Potential strategic alliance development
   - SI-side experience,VoIP, PBX,
   - Embedded software engineering experience in international marketing in such fields as embedded smartphones, network and technical sales
    *SI-side experience most needed


Location of Position: South Korea
Application Deadline: Please forward resume & cover letter to KOTRA Toronto by Oct. 1st, 2009.
Contact: Mr. Chris Lee, Business Development Officer
65 Queen St. W. Suite 600, P.O. Box 9, Toronto, ON, M5H 2M5
Telephone: 416-368-3399 x.228 Fax: 416-368-2893 Email: chrislee@kotra.ca
post.title: [KOTRA] 무선통신 마케팅 전문가 모집
